column1: # SOURCE: Synthetic data based on small wind turbine manufacturer specifications (Bergey
# DESCRIPTION: Wind turbine specifications for 3 microgrid-scale turbine sizes

# LOGIC: Turbines designed for low-wind sites (IEC Class III/IV) with lower rated speeds and larger rotors relative to capacity for better capacity factors. Values aligned with generate_power_data.py used to produce precomputed wind output.
# ASSUMPTIONS: Moderate wind resource typical of Sinai coastal areas; capacity factors conservative for hot dusty environment
